4.eng-name: The Book of Ghusl and Tayammum

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"I used to perform Ghusl - the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and I - from one vessel. He would compete with me and I would with him (to take the water) until he would say: 'Leave me some,' and I would say, 'Leave me some
